title: A Miscellany of Britain: People, Places, History, Culture, Customs, Sport
description: Illustrated throughout, 'A Miscellany of Britain' puts you right about many truths and half-truths, from Nelson's eyepatch and the number of wives Henry VIII had, to where the word 'curry' comes from and the origins of the police helmet back in the 19th century.
author: Tom O'Meara
